name: one-eyed Pete
description:
Objective

Collect 3 gold coins and kill Captain Silver Tongue

Controls

  • Run - Hold left or right arrow keys
  • Jump - Press space
  • Climb - Press up or down arrow keys
  • Restart - Press R

Credits

  • Design & Development by Game Favorites
  • Artwork mostly by 0x72 from itch.io (I have modified, animated and added a few things, please see the original art from 0x72 for comparison)
  • Text Font by N3tRunn3r from dafont.com
  • Music by: Hot Music from pixabay.com
  • Sound Effects by multiple creators (see below)

The following sound effects were from Freesound.org and have a Creative Commons 0 license:

  • cannon - Isaac200000
  • cannonball collisions - yottasounds
  • coin pickup - MATRIXXX_
  • drowning - MATRIXXX_
  • ending yar voice - JD_Brick_Productions
  • hit by bullet - FilmmakersManual
  • opening chest - EminYILDIRIM
  • parrot squawk - AntumDeluge
  • pistol - Jocabundus
  • restore health - GameAudio
  • sword strike - Mrthenoronha

Warnings

  • Game contains cartoon violence
  • Shows that drinking beer replenishes health (This is not true in the real world)

Recommendations

  • Click on the bottom right corner to play in FULL SCREEN
  • If the game is unresponsive, CLICK INSIDE THE GAME WINDOW

Development Details

This game was made using Construct 3 and it was made for GhostBit Jam #1 and GDKO 2023 - Round 1
